EmailTemplate.subject: You’re Invited to the Open Data Platform Initiative (ODPi) Meetup tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The first release of the Open Data Platform Initiative (ODPi) is coming soon, and there’s still time before the first release to influence the specifications and contribute to the validation test suite!
Attend the ODPi meetup on February 4th if your company develops, integrates with, or uses Apache Hadoop (tm) technologies to learn about the specifications and find out how you can test your distributions and integrated products to ensure compliance.
Important thought leaders within the Hadoop community will be on-hand to answer your questions and hear your feedback. This is your opportunity to help steer a standard that will become the base for accelerating adoption and innovation of the Apache Hadoop ecosystem.
REGISTER NOW <[[http://www.meetup.com/Open-Data-Platform-Group/events/228266209/]]>
In addition to networking opportunities, there will be a panel discussion, moderated by Gregory Chase, Director of Big Data Community Marketing at Pivotal. Panelists include:
• Richard Pelavin—Co-Founder and CTO, Reactor8, Inc. • Sumit Mohanty—Senior Engineering Manager at Hortonworks and Ambari PMC Member • Alan Gates—Co-Founder at Hortonworks • Roman Shaposhnik—Director of Open Source at Pivotal and Founder of Apache Bigtop • Satheesh Bandaram—Director, Hadoop, Spark and Cloud at IBM • Raj Desai—Software Engineer at IBM and Member of the ODPi Technical Steering Committee
Can't join us in person? No need to RSVP—you can participate via LiveStream <[[https://livestream.com/pemo/odpi]]>.
